data:
Acting for civic involvement it's a bilateral youth exchange involving 60 participants, 50 young people aged 18-25 and 10 group leaders from England and Romania which will take place in Marabu Camp in Romania between 10 and 20 August 2018.

Aim and objectives:
The aim of this project is to strengthen young participants to become active citizens in the countries they live in no mater their economical situation, religion, color of skin or others specificity's which define their identity

The main objectives: 
1. to increase the knowledge for 50 participants about identity 
2. increasing the civic involvement and  sense of initiative for 50 young people 
3. to develop the self esteem for 50 young people from Romania and England
4.to develop the skills and competences of 50 participants about oratory, rhetoric and theater,
5. to develop the  cooperation between youth NGOs from Romania and England

In this project we will have 3 big activities:
1. The preparation of the project: which already started and will continue also after the project approval with meetings at national level of the young people with the project team but also with a preparatory meeting organised in Romania..
This preparatory meeting have the aim to bring together the partners and discuss all the details of the exchange in order that we can ofer a life changing experience to the participants.
In this stage we will also select the participants, prepare them for the meeting in Romania, prepare the trip and continue to communicate with our partners, deal with logistics and sign an internal agreement between us. We will also create a space for participants on Facebook were they can speak and know each other before the meeting.

2. Implementation of the project
The youth exchange will take place in Romania and will have the same aim and objectives like the project. The activities were decided together with the young people to respond to their needs and fulfill the objectives of the project. The methodology will be based on non formal education. You  can see a more detailed program attached.

3. Promotion of the results,  follow up and clusure:
After the exchange each partner will have the task together with all the participants to promote the results of this project and organise back home activities which to contribute to the project objectives - to promote inclusion of young people and increase their confidence and self esteem. For the promotion of the results the partner NGO's will deal with institutions and NGO sector and the participants with the local community.

As results we expect that this project will strengthen young participants to become active citizens in the countries they live in no mater their economical situation, religion, color of skin or others specificity's which define their identity
